data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Betul, Madhya Pradesh, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Betul, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Betul.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Betul. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Betul, Madhya Pradesh, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Khangar (Muslim traditions) people.
Father, grace the churches in Betul, Madhya Pradesh, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 17,329 believers in Betul against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Betul.
